title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI tool to pull, run and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, exposing sync & async APIs to chat, generate embeddings and more.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / Node client for Ollama with TypeScript support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents and retrieval.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm package wrapping the Ollama REST API for Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python on PyPI
summary: PyPI distribution of the official Ollama Python client.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Self-hosted ChatGPT-style web UI that connects to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client library for Ollama with fluent builder APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing a simple client for the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-cli (Go)
summary: Lightweight Go CLI that wraps Ollama REST endpoints for quick model chat and file ingestion.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for fine-tuning, RAG, function-calling and advanced Ollama patterns.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-use Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, Open-WebUI, or LibreChat.

title: ollama-kt
summary: Kotlin multiplatform SDK for Ollama supporting JVM, Android and native targets.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed, async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart package for Flutter and server-side Dart projects to call Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library and CLI tool for Ollama with support for streaming chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models through slash commands.
